description: Metadata for a speaker preset This is stored unencrypted for easy identification without decryption

id.description: Unique preset identifier (UUID v4 or v7)

name.description: Human-readable preset name (e.g., "Dynaudio Core 7 RevB" or "KRK Rokit 5 G4")

sample_rate.description: Vector of supported sample rates (48kHz or 96kHz)

vendor_lock.description: Vendor lock - prevents preset from being used with different vendor hardware

title: ChannelPresetMetadata
